books.title: The Kite Runner
books.description: A novel about the unlikely friendship between a wealthy boy and the son of his father's servant, set against the backdrop of a changing Afghanistan.
books.author: Khaled Hosseini

books.title: A Thousand Splendid Suns
books.description: A powerful story of two women's struggle for survival and resilience in war-torn Afghanistan.
books.author: Khaled Hosseini

books.title: And the Mountains Echoed
books.description: An exploration of the ways in which families nurture, wound, betray, honor, and sacrifice for one another.
books.author: Khaled Hosseini

books.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
books.description: A novel set in the Great Depression that focuses on themes of racial injustice and moral growth.
books.author: Harper Lee

books.title: The Catcher in the Rye
books.description: A novel about the challenges of teenage angst and alienation.

books.title: Moby-Dick
books.description: The narrative of Captain Ahab's obsessive quest to kill the white whale, Moby Dick.
books.author: Herman Melville

books.title: The Great Gatsby
books.description: A novel about the American dream and the excesses of the Jazz Age.
books.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

books.title: War and Peace
books.description: A historical novel that intertwines the lives of several families during the Napoleonic Wars.
books.author: Leo Tolstoy

books.title: The Patience Stone
books.description: A gripping tale of a woman tending to her comatose husband, revealing her deepest secrets and desires.
books.author: Atiq Rahimi

books.title: into the Future
books.description: The Favored Daughter: One Woman's Fight to Lead Afghanistan ,The memoir of Fawzia Koofi, Afghanistan's first female Parliament speaker, detailing her journey from a traditional family to becoming a prominent political figure.
books.author: Fawzia Koofi
